_a-0000e79a-fc04-8000-9bf4-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_findFillIns

_a-0000e3ff-a5bc-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnArrayTypeNumber

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_extractUuidAndFillinTypeFromClassParameter
_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  a!isNotNullOrEmpty(ri!citeOrHighlightTag),
  a!localVariables(
    local!isTableFillIn: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!tables),
      false,
      or(
        find(
          rule!AS_GCM_removeHiddenSpanTagsFromHtml(ri!citeOrHighlightTag),
          tostring(ri!tables)
        ) > 0,
        find(
          ri!citeOrHighlightTag,
          tostring(ri!tables)
        ) > 0
      )
    ),
    local!class: regexfirstmatch(
      "class=""(.*?)""",
      ri!citeOrHighlightTag
    ),
    local!uuidAndTypeSplit: split(
      regexreplaceall("class=""cite |""", local!class, ""),
      " "
    ),
    /*Checking whether the first item has only alphabets*/
    local!isFirstItemFillinType: regexmatch(
      "^[a-zA-Z]+$",
      local!uuidAndTypeSplit[1]
    ),
    a!map(
      uuid: if(
        local!isFirstItemFillinType,
        "",
        local!uuidAndTypeSplit[1]
      ),
      fillinType: a!defaultValue(
        value: ri!fillinType,
        default: a!match(
          value: local!uuidAndTypeSplit,
          whenTrue: local!isTableFillIn,
          then: cons!AS_GCM_TXT_CUSTOM_FILL_IN_TYPE_TABLE,
          whenTrue: local!isFirstItemFillinType,
          then: fv!value[1],
          default: index(fv!value, 2, "")
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  ""
)

_a-0000e447-933d-8000-9baa-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_toString

_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_regexsearch
_a-0000e8e8-3f98-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule is used to handle the weird behaviour seen sometimes in the regexsearch function where the returned data is not indexable or erroring out. 
To fix this we are explicitly casting to make it proper.
*/
#"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
  items: regexsearch(
    ri!pattern,
    ri!searchString,
    ri!regexFlag,
    ri!returnGroups
  ),
  expression: a!map(
    match: touniformstring(index(fv!item, "match", "")),
    startPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "startPosition", null)),
    endPosition: tointeger(index(fv!item, "endPosition", null)),
    groups: rule!AS_CO_UT_castToDictionaryList(index(fv!item, "groups", null))
  )
)

rule!AS_ADT_UT_calculateAudit(
    originalObjects: ri!auditParams.originalObjects,
    newObjects: ri!auditParams.newObjects,
    objectTypeNumber: ri!auditParams.objectTypeNumber,
    namespace: ri!auditParams.namespace,
    username: ri!auditParams.username,
    auditConfig: ri!auditParams.auditConfig,
    externalAction:ri!auditParams.externalAction
  )

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
choose(
  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_getFillinMapsAndClauseTextUsingHighlightOrCiteTags

_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_filterRecords
_a-0000eb32-2fbb-8000-9d0d-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!fieldValuePairs: a!defaultValue(
    ri!fieldValuePairs,
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: a!flatten(ri!field),
      expression: a!map(
        field: fv!item,
        value: if(
          fv!itemCount = 1,
          ri!value,
          index(a!flatten(ri!value), fv!index, null)
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!matchIndices: if(
    a!isNullOrEmpty(a!flatten(ri!records)),
    tointeger({}),
    reduce(
      rule!AS_GCM_filterRecords_Reducer(
        previousIndices: _,
        records: a!flatten(ri!records),
        fieldValuePair: _
      ),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1,
      local!fieldValuePairs
    )
  ),
  local!rejectIndices: difference(
    if(
      a!isNullOrEmpty(ri!records),
      tointeger({}),
      enumerate(count(a!flatten(ri!records))) + 1
    ),
    local!matchIndices
  ),
  local!matches: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!matchIndices, {})
  ),
  local!rejects: cast(
    runtimetypeof(ri!records),
    index(ri!records, local!rejectIndices, {})
  ),
  local!output: a!match(
    value: a!defaultValue(ri!filterType, "FILTER"),
    equals: "FILTER",
    then: local!matches,
    equals: "REJECT",
    then: local!rejects,
    equals: "FIRST_MATCH",
    then: index(local!matches, 1, null),
    equals: "FIRST_REJECT",
    then: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
    equals: "MATCH_COUNT",
    then: count(local!matchIndices),
    equals: "REJECT_COUNT",
    then: count(local!rejectIndices),
    equals: "MATCH_INDICES",
    then: local!matchIndices,
    equals: "REJECT_INDICES",
    then: local!rejectIndices,
    equals: "FULL_RESULT",
    then: a!map(
      matches: local!matches,
      rejects: local!rejects,
      firstMatch: index(local!matches, 1, null),
      firstReject: index(local!rejects, 1, null),
      matchCount: count(local!matchIndices),
      rejectCount: count(local!rejectIndices),
      matchIndices: local!matchIndices,
      rejectIndices: local!rejectIndices
    ),
    default: fn!error(
      "Invalid filterType, must be one of: FILTER, REJECT, FIRST_MATCH, FIRST_REJECT, MATCH_COUNT, REJECT_COUNT, MATCH_INDICES, REJECT_INDICES, FULL_RESULT"
    )
  ),
  local!output
)

  ri!value,
  
  ri!inArray,
  
  ri!replacement,

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
if(
  all(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank,
    { ri!clauses, ri!clauseTexts }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_initializeBlankLocalVariable(
    type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper'
  ),
  /*Combining AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause and AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Text*/
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
    items: ri!clauses,
    expression: rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
      type: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper',
      value: {
        relationId: fv!item.relationId,
        setId: fv!item.setId,
        refClause: fv!item.refClause,
        section: fv!item.section,
        refUsage: fv!item.refUsage,
        refStatus: fv!item.refStatus,
        refAddedVia: fv!item.refAddedVia,
        format: fv!item.format,
        effectiveDate: fv!item.effectiveDate,
        validationAction: fv!item.validationAction,
        clauseTitle: fv!item.clauseTitle,
        retainedEffectiveDate: fv!item.retainedEffectiveDate,
        alternateValue:fv!item.alternateValue,
        clauseText: rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
          cdt: ri!clauseTexts,
          field: "relationId",
          value: index(fv!item, "relationId", null)
        ).clauseText,
        /*Metadata from both the CDTs would be the same. Using AS_GCM_R_Clause's data here*/
        createdBy: fv!item.createdBy,
        createdDatetime: fv!item.createdDatetime,
        modifiedBy: fv!item.modifiedBy,
        modifiedDatetime: fv!item.modifiedDatetime,
        isActive: fv!item.isActive
      }
    )
  )
)

{
  fieldName: "clauses",
  auditFieldName: "clausesChanges",
  idField: "relationId",
  foreignIdField: "setId",
  simpleFields: {
    "setId",
    "refClause.clauseId",
    "section.sectionLabel",
    "clauseTitle",
    "alternateValue",
    "clauseText",
    "refUsage.refDataId",
    "refStatus.refDataId",
    "format.refDataId",
    "effectiveDate",
    "isActive",
    "validationAction"
  },
  complexFields: {}
}

_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_UT_clauseSetClauseStartAuditProcess_Parameters
_a-0000e67d-efac-8000-9bcd-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_ADT_UT_startAuditProcess_Parameters(
  originalObjects: rule!AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText(
    clauses: ri!originalClauses,
    clauseTexts: ri!originalClauseTexts
  ),
  newObjects: rule!AS_GCM_BL_constructHelperForClauseSetClauseAndClauseText(
    clauses: ri!clauses,
    clauseTexts: ri!clauseTexts
  ),
  objectType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause_Helper',
  auditDse: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_A_R_CLAUSE_SET,
  auditConfig: rule!AS_GCM_ADT_BL_auditConfig_ClauseSet(),
  /*Audit type - Manipulation as we capture the audit of clause nested under ClauseSet*/
  auditType: cons!AS_GAM_ADT_TXT_AUDIT_TYPE_MANIPULATION,
  externalAction: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
    nullableValue: ri!externalAction,
    replacementValue: cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY
  ),
  complexFieldName: "clausesChanges",
  username: ri!initiator
).auditParams

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_DPL_GAM_COMP_richTextFieldWithTablePlugin
_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/* Context: on page load, any editable RichTextField will load, rendering Quill's logic to format the input into a "Quill-style" HTML. RichTextField will also render when there is any interaction with the form via other components, because it's default set to refreshAlways=true. We want to address the scenario where if the user makes an interaction with the form but does not modify the value of the RichTextField, the naive implementation of RichTextField will update the original input text value to be "Quill-styled". This causes issues in GCM when trying to compare the stored HTML (that wasn't actually updated in the RichTextField but because of another form interaction causing the "Quill-style" to be applied) to the HTML from acquisition.gov. The fix works as follow: 1) Upon loading the form, we will store the original input text value 2) Upon loading the form, we will also store the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value 3) During each trigger of RichTextField's saveInto (either because of another component's interaction or the RichTextField's interaction), we will check to see if the current Quill-style HTML is the same as the original Quill-style HTML. 3a) If they are the same, this means that either there was an interaction with a non-RTE component or that the user reverted their changes to the original input text value. We will then output the original HTML value, instead of the Quill-style HTML 3b) If they are different, this means that the user changed the input value in the RTE, and therefore we need to store the Quill-style HTML Refer to the comments for local!originalText, local!quillFormattedOriginalText, and for the saveIntos for the RTE Implications/TO-DOs: 1) If the RTE is first rendered as read-only on form load, then Quill will not execute to render the Quill-style HTML. Even if there was a checkbox to turn the RTE editable, Quill had already loaded and so making it editable does not cause it to execute. This means that we cannot get the Quill-style HTML based on the original input text value at load. 2) If there is another component on the page that causes the input text to be updated (e.g., there is a dropdown that depending on the value of the dropdown causes the initial text to change), then we will always be storing Quill-style HTML of those input texts. However, perhaps this is what is expected. */ /* RichTextField doesn't support validations on the "required" field. Refer to https://community.appian.com/w/the-appian-playbook/1378/end-user-rich-text-editor-component. This implementation of RTE uses section-level validations if required=true in the RTE */ a!localVariables( local!required: if( ri!readOnly = true, false, rule!AS_CO_UT_booleanDefaultFalse(ri!required) ), /*This stores the original text value on page load*/ local!originalText: a!refreshVariable( value: ri!text, refreshOnReferencedVarChange: false ), /*This stores the original text value on page load -- but in quill format*/ /*And the way this is actually set is through RTE's immediate save-out on page load of an editable RTE*/ /*To actually pass back out the "quill-style" HTML*/ local!quillFormattedOriginalText: null, if( cons!AS_GCM_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED, #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_paragraphField"( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, requiredMessage: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, characterLimit: a!defaultValue( ri!maxSize, cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ), value: substitute( joinarray(split(ri!text, "

"), char(10)), "

", "" ), saveInto: a!save( ri!text, "

" & joinarray(split(save!value, char(10)), "

") & "

" ) ), { richTextFieldWithTables( label: ri!label, labelPosition: ri!labelPosition, richTextValue: ri!text, richTextSaveInto: if( /*Added condition to handle saves on readonly */ri!readOnly = true(), {}, { if( /*This checks that the save-out is the initial RTE save out that happens on page load*/ and( rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!quillFormattedOriginalText), rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(local!originalText) ), /*On the very first load of the page, only save into quillFormattedOriginalText*/ /*This save out happens any time an editable rich text field is rendered*/ /*We can determine if its the first load by checking that quillFormattedOriginalText is null*/ a!save( local!quillFormattedOriginalText, save!value ), /*On subsequent interactions, first check if the quillFormattedOriginalText value is different than the original*/ /*And if so, only then perform the true saves we want*/ if( /*preventing ri!text save by updating ri!triggerSave as false*/ /*saving ri!triggerSave as true if ri!triggerSave=false as we need to update it to true anyways to trigger ri!text save*/ /*scenario: Enabling the button save when there is no change in clause RTE but a change in fill-in type dropdown*/ ri!triggerSave = false, a!save(ri!triggerSave, true), { a!save( ri!text, a!match( value: save!value, whenTrue: not( rule!AS_GCM_doesHtmlContainVisibleCharacters(text: fv!value) ), then: "", whenTrue: exact( tostring(fv!value), tostring(local!quillFormattedOriginalText) ), then: /*Run a "save" that sets ri!text back to its original value*/ local!originalText, default: /*Update ri!text*/ regexreplaceall( /* Removing the transparent background colors to make sure to pasted text is proper */ "background\-color:(" & char(32) & ")?(transparent|#ffffff|#FFFFFF);?", fv!value, "" ) ) ) } ) ), ri!saveInto } ), readOnly: ri!readOnly, required: ri!required, height: ri!height, validations: ri!validations, instructions: ri!instructions, maxSize: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull( nullableValue: ri!maxSize, replacementValue: cons!AS_GAM_INT_RTE_MAX_CHARACTERS ) ), #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_sectionLayout_v1"( showWhen: local!required, marginBelow: "NONE", validations: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_validationMessage"( message: rule!AS_CO_UT_displayRequiredMessage( label: ri!label, requiredMessage: ri!requiredMessage ), validateAfter: "SUBMIT", showWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!text) ) ) } ) )

_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.name: AS_CO_UT_returnCdtIndicesByField
_a-0000e40a-de32-8000-9ba8-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Integer?list',
  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
    values: ri!value,
    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
      cdt: a!flatten(ri!cdt),
      field: ri!field,
      indexDefault: null
    )
  )
)

_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QR_getFillInRecDetails
_a-0000e915-02bc-8000-9c1f-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryRecord(
  sort: ri!sort,
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  recordType: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!fillInRecFillInUuid)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.fillInRecFillInUuid,
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!fillInRecFillInUuid
    ),
    a!match(
      value: ri!isAutoPopulated,
      /* When nothing is passed all data should be returned     */
      whenTrue: a!isNullOrEmpty(fv!value),
      then: {},
      equals: true(),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isAutoPopulated,
        operator: "=",
        value: true
      ),
      /*  When false is passed returning all data except isAutoPopulated=true    */
      default: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
        field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isAutoPopulated,
        operator: "<>",
        value: true
      ),
      
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: recordType!AS GCM Fill In Recommendation.isActive,
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applyWhen: rule!AS_CO_UT_not(input: ri!includeInactive)
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  fields: ri!fields
)

{
  auditParams: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:ADT}AS_ADT_P_AuditProcessParameters'(

    ),

    ),
    objectTypeNumber: rule!AS_CO_UT_returnTypeNumber(type: ri!objectType),

    objectDse: ri!objectDse,

    ),

    auditConfig: ri!auditConfig,
    auditType: ri!auditType,
    manipulationAudit: ri!manipulationAudit,
    complexFieldName: ri!complexFieldName
  )
}

  reduce(

    ri!cdt,

  )
)

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_FM_editClauseSetClause

_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_QE_getClauseSetClauseDetails
_a-0000e643-f7f1-8000-9bca-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_queryEntity(
  sort: ri!sort,
  entity: cons!AS_GCM_ENT_CLAUSE_SET_CLAUSE,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GCM}AS_GCM_ClauseSet_Clause',
  returnType: ri!returnType,
  executeWhen: and(
    ri!executeWhen,
    or(
      any(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(_),
        {
          ri!additionalFilters,
          ri!logicalExpression,
          ri!aggregation
        }
      ),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!setId),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!relationId)
    )
  ),
  /* To ensure proper null checks, we'll force all queryFilter values to not be null */
  logicalExpression: ri!logicalExpression,
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  batchSize: ri!batchSize,
  triggerRefresh: ri!triggerRefresh,
  filters: {
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "relationId",
      operator: "in",
      value: ri!relationId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "setId",
      operator: "=",
      value: ri!setId
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
      field: "isActive",
      operator: "=",
      value: true,
      applywhen: ri!showInactive <> true()
    ),
    ri!additionalFilters
  },
  aggregation: ri!aggregation
)

0002e668-585e-8000-1aad-7f0000014e7a.name: AS GCM Edit Clause Set Clause

_a-0000eae2-5167-8000-9ce4-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GAM_returnCdtOrRecordIndicesByField

_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GCM_CPS_ClauseSetRelatedActionPlaceholder
_a-0000ed5b-ded3-8000-9df2-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!bundle: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!bundle,
    default: rule!AS_GCM_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null())
  ),
  {
    if(
      ri!isSmallDialog,
      {},
      {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        ),
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
          marginAbove: "EVEN_MORE",
          marginBelow: "EVEN_MORE"
        )
      }

    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_imageField_v1"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      images: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_documentImage"(
        document: cons!AS_GCM_DOC_CLAUSE_SET_GENERATION_STATE
      ),
      size: "SMALL_PLUS",
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE"),
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        text: "Clause Set Generation is in progress",
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"STANDARD","MEDIUM")
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "LESS",
      marginBelow: "LESS"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
      labelPosition: "COLLAPSED",
      value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
        size: if(ri!isSmallDialog,"SMALL",""),
        text: "This action will be available once the clause set generation is complete"
      ),
      align: "CENTER",
      marginBelow: "STANDARD"
    ),
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_ButtonArrayLayout"(
      buttons: {
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_buttonWidget_v1"(
          label: "Close",
          icon: "close",
          value: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_USER_ACTION_CANCEL,
          saveInto: ri!userAction,
          submit: true,
          size: "SMALL",
          style: "SOLID",
          color: "SECONDARY"
        )
      },
      align: "CENTER",
      marginAbove: "STANDARD",
      marginBelow: if(ri!isSmallDialog, "NONE", "EVEN_MORE")
    )
  }
)
